attributes.action: Increase the legal drinking age to 21 years of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increase the legal drinking of alcohol to 21 years of age.
Smoking has just seen an increase to 18 years of age.
This would hopefully reduce the number of underage drinkers, drunken crimes and related injuries.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/UnderageDrinking/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
